titles.title: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to increase the salary of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to increase the salary of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to increase the salary of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia to 150% of the rate of basic pay for level I of the Executive Schedule.
